mapper.select: SELECT third.trade_date, first.ts_code, basic.symbol, basic.name, basic.industry, third.open, third.high, third.low, third.close, third.vol, third.amount FROM ( -- 第一天 大阴线 SELECT ts_code, close, low, vol FROM daily WHERE trade_date = #{firstDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND open > close AND (open - close) / (high - low) > #{firstThreshold,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ) AS first JOIN ( -- 第二天 实体较小,跳空开盘,收盘价小于昨天收盘价 SELECT ts_code, open, close, vol FROM daily WHERE trade_date = #{secondDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS second ON first.ts_code = second.ts_code JOIN ( -- 第三天 大阳线,收盘价大于第一天收盘价 SELECT ts_code, open, close, vol, amount, high, low, trade_date FROM daily WHERE trade_date = #{thirdDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (close - open) / (high - low) > #{thirdThreshold,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ) AS third ON first.ts_code = third.ts_code JOIN ( SELECT ts_code, symbol, name, industry FROM stock_basic WHERE market = '主板' ) AS basic ON first.ts_code = basic.ts_code WHERE second.open < first.low AND second.close < first.close AND third.close > first.close AND third.vol > second.vol AND third.vol > first.vol ORDER BY third.amount DESC

SELECT second.trade_date, first.ts_code, basic.symbol, basic.name, basic.industry, second.open, second.high, second.low, second.close, second.vol, second.amount FROM ( -- 第一天 大阴线 SELECT ts_code, close, low, vol FROM daily WHERE trade_date = #{firstDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND open > close AND (open - close) / (high - low) > #{firstThreshold,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ) AS first JOIN ( -- 第二天 实体较小,跳空开盘,收盘价小于昨天收盘价 SELECT ts_code, trade_date, high, low, open, close, vol, amount FROM daily WHERE trade_date = #{secondDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS second ON first.ts_code = second.ts_code JOIN ( SELECT ts_code, symbol, name, industry FROM stock_basic WHERE market = '主板' ) AS basic ON first.ts_code = basic.ts_code WHERE second.open < first.low AND second.close < first.close ORDER BY second.amount DESC
